text: The Mankato Marathon is a race run in Mankato, Minnesota. It was created in 2009. In 2018, 326 finishers crossed the finish line.https://live.mtecresults.com/race/show/7600/2018_Mankato_Marathon- Marathon The marathon is certified by the USATF, making it a qualifier for the Boston Marathon. The course makes a full loop around the city (and Minnesota State University, Mankato) before finishing on historic Front Street. ==References== ==External links== * * * * * Mankato Marathon YouTube channel Category:Foot races in Minnesota Category:Marathons in Minnesota Category:Marathons in the United States Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2009
title: Mankato Marathon
